venue.name: The Middle East Restaurant and Nightclub

item.description:
Let's plan on meeting at the bar on the Middle East upstairs side to get a few drinks before the show. I'll be there by 9, then plan on heading down whenever Here We Go Magic go on (probably around 10). I'll email my mobile number to attendees so you can find me/the group. - Matt

The Walkmen, Here We Go Magic (Western Vinyl Records), The Dig – Night One
18+, doors 8pm - tickets $15

Ticket info:
Tickets for Middle East Club events are available:

* In person at the Middle East Box Office - 1pm to 7pm, seven days a week -- without service charge.

* At all Ticketmaster locations
-- at www.ticketmaster.com
-- By phone at (617) 931-2000.

For general info call the Middle East box office at (617) 864-EAST ext 221.

From Wikipedia:

The Walkmen is an American indie rock band, with members based in New York City and Philadelphia. The band formed in 2000 with three members from Jonathan Fire*Eater — Paul Maroon (guitar, piano), Walter Martin (organ/bass), and Matt Barrick (drums) — and two from The Recoys, Peter Bauer (bass/organ) and Hamilton Leithauser (vocals, guitar). All but Bauer attended St. Albans in Washington, D.C.

They prefer the sound of vintage musical instruments, particularly the upright piano, and have often recorded at Marcata Recording, a recording studio built in Harlem in 1999 by the three former members of Jonathan Fire*Eater and later relocated to upstate New York.
item.name: The Walkmen @ The Middle East (downstairs)
